abstract: Chicago White Sox general manager Ken Williams says he considered first baseman Paul Konerko as player/manager before choosing Robin Ventura to head the team; other baseball items noted.
snippet: Chicago White Sox’ General Manager Ken Williams said that he had considered first baseman Paul Konerko as a player/manager.
lead_paragraph: Chicago White Sox’ General Manager Ken Williams said that he had considered first baseman Paul Konerko as a player/manager.

headline.seo: White Sox Considered Player-Manager Role for Konerko
